Event Name: HS Girls Soccer @ White House Heritage HS
Chilli-Cook Off hosted by MS Student Council [In-person]
Event Location: East Robertson Cafe
Event Description:
Location ERHS Cafeteria
Get ready for a flavorful kickoff to Friday night lights! The East Robertson Middle School Student Council is turning up the heat with a Chili Cook-Off just before the big football game. Students, parents, and community members are invited to come out and sample a variety of homemade chili recipes—all crafted by our Cross Plains community. The fee is $5 per person or $20 per organization to enter.
🎉 Event Highlights:

  *
Tasting stations with various chili varieties
  *
Judging panel featuring local leaders
  *
First, Second, and Third place winners
  *
People's Choice voting for fan-favorite chili
  *
Music and activities
  *
Perfect warm-up before cheering on the Indians under the Friday night lights

Proceeds from the cook-off will support future Student Council initiatives, so every bite helps build a better school community. Come hungry, bring your team spirit, and let’s spice up game night together!

Event Location: East Robertson High School (158 Kilgore Trce, Cross Plains, TN 37049, United States)
